message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $10,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,500?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,500 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $11,000? This would be a good deal for both of us.
